content.GPT-summary: The post is an explanation of Ethereum Improvement Proposal 2035 (EIP 2035), which proposes to reprice SLOAD and SSTORE to pay for block proofs in stateless clients. The post does not advertise the proposal, nor does it ask for collaboration or feedback. However, it does provide details on the proposal and may prompt questions or constructive criticism from third parties.
